item.title: Next stop for gold is $4,000, says JPMorgan
item.description: "Tariff-driven recession and stagflation risks are forecasted to continue to supercharge gold's structural bull run," analyst Gregory Shearer said.

item.title: Tesla could see big swings on earnings. This 'Iron Condor' options trade can mitigate volatility risk
item.description: Selling an Iron Condor is an options trading strategy where you simultaneously sell out-of-the-money call spreads and put spreads.

item.title: Bank of America double upgrades this little-known sports data stock
item.description: The bank says a sports technology stock could see major gains ahead on the back of global growth in online sports betting.

item.title: Wells Fargo downgrades UPS, says tariffs to hit shipping volume
item.description: Wells Fargo's forecast now implies 1.8% upside from Monday's $96.25 close. Shares of UPS have pulled back nearly 24% in 2025.

item.title: Here are Tuesday's biggest analyst calls: Apple, Nvidia, Tesla, Amazon, Meta, Disney, McDonald's & more
item.description: Here are Tuesday's biggest calls on Wall Street.
